description: A collection of utility functions designed to analyze, match, visualize, and solve problems related to Maxwell's equations in electromagnetism. The tools support symbolic reasoning, equation-description alignment, and visual representation of electromagnetic field laws.

function.name: maxwell_integral_laws
function.description: Analyzes Maxwell's equations in integral form and extracts or derives physical laws from given electromagnetic scenarios.

result.description: 返回麦克斯韦积分定律的相关信息

laws.description: 包含麦克斯韦四个积分形式定律的列表

function.name: match_description_to_equation
function.description: Matches a natural language description of an electromagnetic situation to the most appropriate Maxwell equation, returning a corresponding identifier.

result.description: 将物理描述与对应的麦克斯韦方程匹配

equation.description: 匹配的麦克斯韦方程的数学表达式

function.name: visualize_maxwell_equations
function.description: Generates visual representations (e.g., field lines, flux, circulation) of Maxwell's equations based on input field configurations.

result.description: 生成麦克斯韦方程的可视化表示

visualization.description: 可视化结果的URL或Base64编码图像数据

function.name: solve_maxwell_questions
function.description: Solves physics questions involving Maxwell's equations by reasoning through boundary conditions, symmetries, and integral forms.

result.description: 解答与麦克斯韦方程相关的物理问题
